```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)

library(plotly)

```

plot in manhattan by grade

```{r}
data("rest_inspec")

american = rest_inspec |>
  filter(str_detect(cuisine_description, "American"),
         boro == "Manhattan",
         !is.na(grade),
         !is.na(latitude),
         !is.na(longitude),
         latitude != 0,      
         longitude != 0)

plot_ly(american,
        x = ~longitude,
        y = ~latitude,
        type = "scatter",
        mode = "markers",
        color = ~grade,
        colors = "viridis")
```



```{r}
american |>
  mutate(zipcode = factor(zipcode),
         zipcode = fct_reorder(zipcode, score)) |>
  plot_ly(
    x = ~zipcode,         
    y = ~score,           
    type = "box",
    color = ~zipcode,      
    colors = "viridis",
    showlegend = FALSE    
  )
```
